verbose_text: To determine whether the regulatory steps that initially induce the expression of PPARgamma, C/EBPalpha, and C/EBPbeta were cooperative, as would be predicted for a bistable system, we titrated the PPARgamma activator rosiglitazone into the media of undifferentiated OP9 cells and monitored the resulting protein expression levels after 48 hr (XREF_FIG), a time point at which all three transcription factors showed maximal expression (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of PPARgamma, C/EBPalpha, and C/EBPbeta
